name: Impatience
definition: You grow restless when progress stalls.

name: Obsession
definition: You fixate on one goal to your detriment.

name: Sloth
definition: You resist required effort or change.

name: Distrust
definition: You suspect motives and fear betrayal.

name: Melancholy
definition: You dwell in sorrow and pessimism.

name: Stubbornness
definition: You refuse to change once decided.

name: Cowardice
definition: You shrink from risk and danger.

name: Indifference
definition: You feel little concern for others.

name: Passivity
definition: You allow events to unfold without action.

name: Recklessness
definition: You act without regard for consequences.

name: Skepticism
definition: You doubt all assertions, even good ones.

name: Resentment
definition: You hold grudges over past slights.

name: Vanity
definition: You obsess over appearance and status.

name: Zealousness
definition: You pursue beliefs to unhealthy extremes.

name: Impulsiveness
definition: You act on whims without forethought.

name: Suspicion
definition: You presume foul motives in others.

name: Timidity
definition: You hesitate when decisive action is needed.

name: Distrustfulness
definition: You withhold faith in any alliance.
